title: Steve Bannon's ‘Misdemeanor From Hell’ Trial
itunes:title: Steve Bannon's ‘Misdemeanor From Hell’ Trial
description:
Former federal prosecutor Jennifer Rodgers, an Adjunct Professor of Clinical Law at NYU Law School, discusses longtime Trump advisor Steve Bannon going on trial for criminal contempt for defying a subpoena from the January 6th committee, after a judge eliminated most of his defenses.

Jeffrey Kahn, a Professor at the Southern Methodist University Dedman School of Law, discusses basketball star Brittney Griner's trial on drug charges in Russia.

June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
